tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr N Srinivas is very good in recommending treatment /procedure suitable for me and consideration reasonable charges 

Dr Mrs Aparna who treated me is so good in explaining the treatment and procedures
She is very patience ,cool and careful in following the procedures and explaining the medication post treatment even though she was busy with other appointments 
Hope my other forthcoming appointments will undergo friendly environment and conclude fruitfully
Hospital environment is good. Doctors and staff are very nice.  If possible reduce treatment charges. Poor also can able to pay treatment charges.
Dr Aparna is good at attending patients,very experienced and passionate she took all care for whole procedure

Dr aparna is very experienced and very compassionately 
She takes lot of effort to make you comfort and east 
She is definitely one best doctor I have come across

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This time my experience was a world away from previous experience elsewhere.Some people born with magic in their hands as i have seen in hands of Dr. Reddy and Arpana mam, for those who don't believe in magic. you will  just visit them. But as our forefathers said "nothing having worth comes easy" its true compared to maharashtra here prices are quite...
